brief_summary.textblock:
Open-label, randomized, crossover clinical trials for single oral dose of 60mg fimasartan
      and single IV infusion of 30mg fimasartan to evaluate the absolute bioavailability of
      Kanarb® tablet (fimasartan) in healthy subjects

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trials for Single Oral Dose of 60mg Fimasartan and Single IV Infusion of 30mg Fimasartan to Evaluate the Absolute Bioavailability of Kanarb® Tablet (Fimasartan) in Healthy Subjects

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  age: 20 - 55 years

          -  body weight: standard weight(Broca's index, Possible range is plus or minus
             20percent)

          -  written informed consent

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  known allergy to Fimasartan

          -  existing cardiac or hematological diseases

          -  existing hepatic and renal diseases

          -  existing gastrointestinal diseases

          -  acute or chronic diseases which could affect drug absorption or metabolism history of
             any serious psychological disorder

          -  abnormal diet which could affect drug absorption or metabolism

          -  positive drug or alcohol screening

          -  smokers of 10 or more cigarettes per day

          -  participation in a clinical trial during the last 90 days prior to the start of the
             study

intervention.description: Period 1 fisrt administration of fimasartan 60mg Period 2 second administration of fimasartan 30mg
Period 1 first administration of fimasartan 30mg Period 2 second administration of fimasartan 60mg

clinical_study.official_title: Open-label, Randomized, Crossover Clinical Trials for Single Oral Dose of 60mg Fimasartan and Single IV Infusion of 30mg Fimasartan to Evaluate the Absolute Bioavailability of Kanarb® Tablet (Fimasartan) in Healthy Subjects

oversight_info.authority: South Korea: Korea Food and Drug Administration (KFDA)

primary_outcome.measure: AUCinf, AUC, Cmax, Tmax, half-life; t1/2z, AUCt, Vdss, Cl,

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Bio-availability Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label
